entry.title: Two Paths, One Road | Damian Wayne/Reader insert
entry.summary:
Author: ly_garden

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,132Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Two assassins born and raised in the shadows of Nanda Parbat. Two assassins taught to do better than the other. Two assassins, nominees of the throne. Two assassins competing for recognition. Recognition they can never gain. At least not from the person they expect.Story starts when they are kids <3~ Slow burn, Rivals to friends to eventual lovers, Childhood rivals/friends, He fell first but he didn't know so she thought she fell first and he fell harder, Idiots in love~ Reader insert but Y/n is not mentioned!

entry.title: Mint and Pomegranade
entry.summary:
Author: PresidentHao

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,456Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 105

Summary: Damian could not believe that even after six years of trying to catch her he had not achieved anything; not the slightest trace of her identity, her lair or her plans, being even difficult to find the traces of her wanderings when these were not covered by the trail of blood she dragged with her.To prove his worth as Robin and gain his father's lost trust, he will once again descend into the depths of his origins, not counting that he would end up in a situation that would take him deeper into the darkness of Gotham than he could have imagined.

entry.title: Deranged
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,169Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 68

Summary: "In all honestly? It was his fault."Which all the Gotham untouchable family in the light and untouchable vigilantes at night. However, it all stopped by a single man, a citizen, a civilian no less with no background in anything besides school.No martial arts, no combat training or survival training. The guy is just a guy and that is a problem too. Well not for all of them but still something they aren't too eager to accept.Not yet at least, however they aren't willing to settle these feelings for [M/N].

entry.title: Kingdom of Cards
entry.summary:
Author: minnieears

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,414Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 101

However, it only takes one solid gust of wind to send everything toppling down.This fic is the sequel to my fic Would That I and follows Damian and his fiancee on their journey to overcome the legacies they have handed themselves over to. entry.title: Even without an answer (perhaps the search will be enough)
entry.summary:
Author: thenyoumightaswellwrestleangels

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,178Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: "Where'd you go, beloved?" Damian's voice brings you back, his forefinger tapping gently against your nose as you blink the memory away."Hm?""Your mind went somewhere else," he says softly, understandingly in a way that makes you bristle. "I'd prefer if you take me with you, wherever you're wandering off to."

entry.title: I've Been The Archer, I've Been The Prey
entry.summary:
Author: Totallynotashieldagent

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,594Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 240

Summary: Reader's father and Bruce arranged for her and Damian to marry. However, before Reader's father could truly sit and explain to her his decision he passed away. And Damian never thought to question his father's decision at all.Reader's mother only saw dollar signs for this arrangement and forced it to happen much quicker than ever anticipated. Now it's just two strangers that have been forced together and trying to navigate the expectations of becoming the new IT couple of Gotham while trying to keep their secrets under wraps as Reader learns what it means to be the new Wayne Matriarch since the death of Martha Wayne.

entry.summary:
Author: minnieears

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 120,336Chapters: 50/50Kudos: 1,956

Summary: Being Bruce Wayne's intern is challenging in its own right. Between countless phone calls, meetings, and inconvenient attacks, there is never a dull moment. However, when his youngest son makes it his personal mission to make things more complicated around Wayne Enterprises, the job becomes something entirely different and challenging.This stand-alone romance has minor references to my other works in this series. entry.title: again &. again [Platonic Yandere Batfamily x Neglected Reader]
entry.summary:
Author: flors_de_lune

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,336Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 925

Summary: who would have thought that living with your rich, billionaire father and endless supply of sisters and brothers would actually end up being the worst thirteen and a half year of your life?when your mother was taken away from you at the ripe age of five, you were forced to live at the solemn wayne manor with nobody to accompany you but the butler, alfred pennyworth.there, you learn that giving up was better than trying to gain the attention of your ever-growing family. so you left, and never once tried to look back at the decades of neglect they left you with.but when alfred, your kind caretaker, had started leaving clues of your sudden disappearance; that's when they all take notice and then on starts the ultimate race of chasing freedom, and escaping what once was your gilded cage.little did you know your mother's dark past manifests itself at the worst of times.IMPORTED FROM TUMBLR !- username: @.acid-ixxTRIGGER WARNINGS !- emotional neglect, allusions to sexual assault, prostitution & physical abuse, kidnapping, alcohol abuse, drugging, themes of depression, dissociation, vague traumatic events, mentions of murder, other warnings would be added soon.
